title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Updated GitHub Actions workflows to use `actions/setup-node@v5.0.0` and `actions/github-script@v8.0.0`.
Bumped `walk-sync` dependency to v4.0.1 and added Node 24 support in `package.json`.
Restructured contribution documentation: moved troubleshooting to a how-to guide and added a reference article.
Marked several GitHub Copilot AI models as GA in the supported models reference.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Updated GitHub Actions workflows to use `actions/setup-node@v5.0.0` and `actions/github-script@v8.0.0`.
- Bumped `walk-sync` dependency to v4.0.1 and added Node 24 support in `package.json`.
- Restructured contribution documentation: moved troubleshooting to a how-to guide and added a reference article.
- Marked several GitHub Copilot AI models as GA in the supported models reference.

### Title
Update dependencies, restructure contribution docs, and mark Copilot models as GA
